review: Dr Sapra is a good human being. He spends time to see a patient and always calm and humble. His diagnosis is amazing. He never prescribed unnecessary pathological tests. For my daughter (6 years old) & son (2.7 years old) since last 3 years he is the doctor I visited after one of my friend Professor at DU recommended his name to me. Even if he is not in DU panel I still I am happy to visit him for my children's good health.
reply_text: Sir Thanks for your positive feedback. Regards Dr Sapra Subhash
